author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students Federation of India (SFI) branch in Government Arts College, Tiruvannamalai has staged a demonstration here on Tuesday in support of guest lecturers who protested demanding hike in salary and regularisation of their services.

Demand release of

Kanhaiya Kumar

They also demanded release of Kanhaiya Kumar, Jawaharlal Nehru University Student Union President, who was arrested under sedition charges and stringent action.

Students boycott classes

Students of the Arts College boycotted the classes and participated in the protest that were held in front of their college.

Branch Secretary of SFI R.S.Sathish Kumar led the protest. SFI District Secretary N.Anbarasan and Deputy District Secretary Prakash were among the participants.
title: SFI stages protests supporting demand of guest lecturers
